meanings.sent3: The cat can dance better than me!

meanings.sent1: Please pass me the can of soup.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally kicked the can down the street.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a can of sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The can held a secret message inside.

meanings.definition: A metal container for holding liquids, typically cylindrical and with a handle
meanings.sent1: He used a can to pour the juice.
meanings.sent2: The soda can was cold to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The can rolled away when I dropped it.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed like a can in an empty room.
meanings.sent5: The can had a dent from the fall.
